name: Growing Out (Jevniak)
description: A scientific ark of goodwill – crashed against the realities of society and bureaucracy! Follow the unfortunate alien in his attempt to escape a crumbling lab, built to save him. Discover the history behind the station by traversing the platforms and help Purpello size its security up and down! WASD to move around, Space to jump and E to interract with the doors, R-reload level, infopads and buttons!
